doctor.name: Dr. Sukumar Roy
doctor.specialty: Neuromedicine (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Headache, Backpain) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Sukumar Roy is a Neuromedicine Specialist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), MD (Neurology). He is a Assistant Professor, Neuromedicine at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Sukumar Roy at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 3pm to 8pm (Sat to Thu) & 10am to 1pm (Fri).
